data.title: Linda Ronstadt
data.meta_description: The 11-time Grammy award-winning Linda Ronstadt is the author of Feels Like Home, a sumptuous memoir that offers an ode to the Sonoran borderlands.
data.text:
Linda Ronstadt, the great-granddaughter of Friedrich and Margarita Ronstadt of Sonora, Mexico, is one of the worldâ€™s most acclaimed singers. Her six-decade career encompassed rock, folk, country, light opera, Mexican songs and American standards. She has sold more than 100 million records, won 12 Grammy awards and is in the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame. Linda Ronstadt: The Sound of My Voice, directed by Rob Epstein, just won a Grammy for best musical film at the 63rd Grammy Awards on March 14, 2021.

Ronstadt is writing a new book that has been acquired by Heyday and is set to release in Fall 2022.
